transArray.content: The hotel has a convenient location, a good environment, and a rich breakfast. The service from the front desk guy was also very good. The window was small at first, so I called and changed to a room with a larger window. They were also very considerate and gave me a small gift when I checked out.
The heartfelt words are silent but sweet, the greetings are ordinary but warm, your trust is the most real, the friendship is elegant but the most precious. I wish you happiness and joy!
